price: Ni uko rero, Firawuni yarahakanye iyo Ntumwa, ntiyaheza ngo ayemere, Dushoka Tumuhanisha ibihano vy’akarorero[1].
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, iragabisha uwo wese aca kubiri n’Intumwa akagabitanya, ko ashobora gushikirwa n’ibihano nk’ivyashikiye Firawuni n’abantu biwe.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
